summary: Blood Dragon - Where did he get his name? Maybe it\'s because The Blood Dragon is notorious for purposefully bloodying himself with his victims? Or maybe he\'s just a messy eater? I can\'t really say for sure but the Blood Dragon definitely deserved to live up to his name, hence this new texture.
descriptionHtml:
Ever since I bought Skyrim it has been driving me crazy that all the Dragons pretty much look the same apart from a few color differences. 

Blood Dragon - Where did he get his name? Maybe it\'s because The Blood Dragon is notorious for purposefully bloodying himself with his victims? Or maybe he\'s just a messy eater? I can\'t really say for sure but the Blood Dragon definitely deserved to live up to his name, hence this new texture.

I re-skinned most of the dragon (aside from his hard scales) with a real snake skin texture, I also added lots of glorious blood to the blood dragon in all the right places, killing talons, wings, mouth and teeth.

***I also posted a \"Blood Only\" file which only applies the extra blood textures to the original Blood Dragon skin.

*More to come* - I am trying to modify the textures of all of the dragons to give them a very distinct look in the game, ie Bloody Blood Dragon, Crystal Frost Dragon, Stone Ancient Dragon, ect.

This is my first mod ever so let me know what you think.
author: Cling
